articles.title: KPA to Destroy Means of S. Side's Psychological Warfare
articles.content:
KPA to Destroy Means of S. Side's Psychological Warfare
 Pyongyang, May 26 (KCNA) -- As already reported, the south Korean puppet military gangsters have carved slogans for anti-DPRK psychological warfare on walls of MP posts in the Demilitarized Zone along the Military Demarcation Line and are busy resuming the loudspeaker propaganda as part of the said warfare.
					 The head of the north side delegation to the north-south general-level military talks Wednesday sent the following notice to the south side as regards the reckless moves of the bellicose forces of the puppet military to resume the psychological warfare against the DPRK:
					
					 Recently the south side frantically conducted the operation to distribute anti-DPRK leaflets despite our side's repeated warnings and, not content with this, is going reckless to resume even the said anti-DPRK broadcasting in the frontline area. 
					
					 Such act is nothing but a deliberate and premeditated provocation aimed to push the daily aggravating inter-Korean relations to the brink of war.
					
					 If the south side persists in scattering leaflets and resumes even the above-said broadcasting, the Korean People's Army will be compelled to promptly take its strong counter-actions including physical actions.
					
					 If the south side sets up even loudspeakers in the frontline area to resume the broadcasting, in particular, the KPA will take military steps to blow up one by one the moment they appear by firing sighting shots because such action will be tantamount to a blatant abrogation of the north-south military agreement and a military provocation against the DPRK. 
					
					 Moreover, measures will be taken to totally ban the passage of personnel and vehicles of the south side in the zone under the north-south control in the western coastal area.
					
					 The south Korean puppet war-like forces would be well advised to act with discretion, bearing deep in mind that such measures of the KPA will not end in an empty talk.

articles.title: KCNA: Who Got Benefit from "Cheonan Case"
articles.content:
KCNA: Who Got Benefit from "Cheonan Case"
 Pyongyang, May 26 (KCNA) -- The United States is taking the lead in disturbing the world after the south Korean puppet authorities announced "the results of investigation" into the sinking of warship "Cheonan," a sheer fabrication.
					 When a certain crime occurs, it is an elementary logic in the investigation into it to look into who will benefit most from it.
					
					 The warship of the south Korean navy broke into two pieces and went down to the bottom of the West Sea of Korea. It is the U.S. and its "allies" in the Asia-Pacific who fished in troubled waters in this case, the U.S. being the biggest beneficiary. 
					
					 It is universally known that the DPRK has been focusing all efforts on an all-out offensive to open the gate to a thriving nation in 2012.
					
					 In the light of the common sense that development presupposes peace, the DPRK at present requires peaceful external environment more than ever before. Precisely for this reason the DPRK advanced a proposal for establishing lasting peace-keeping regime on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 This being a hard fact, Americans are floating misinformation that the DPRK got the same political "benefit" from the above-said case as it did by "closely rallying its ranks."
					
					 This is nothing but an excessive logical jump and far-fetched assertion made by those to do harm to the DPRK. They might mistake their subjective desire for reality, obsessed by their strong desire to bring down the system in the DPRK or worked hard to cover up the stark reality in the DPRK where all efforts are concentrated on building an economic power.
					
					 Whoever has logic may understand well that the DPRK would get nothing by orchestrating such case.
					
					 But the case is quite different with the U.S. 
					
					 The U.S. seems to have a complacent smile of satisfaction. It considers the case as a golden opportunity for loudly trumpeting about the "theory of threat from north Korea" in a bid to tighten its grip on its "allies" in the Asia-Pacific region, contain big powers and escalate the offensive for stifling the DPRK.
					
					 As a matter of fact, the Obama administration is straining the situation in a bid to beef up its forces in the region and tighten its military domination over it as evidenced by the order issued by it to its forces in south Korea to be combat ready to cope with another Korean war. 
					
					 Under the U.S. manipulation, the south Korean puppet group and the Japanese authorities openly expressed their strong displeasure with the development of the DPRK-China relations and are becoming more zealous than ever before in escalating the moves to stifle the DPRK by imploring the countries around the DPRK to recognize the hypocritical "results of investigation".
					
					 The Japanese government had been seeking a chance to deceive the people in Okinawa Prefecture under the U.S. pressure over the issue of the transfer of the U.S. forces airfield in Futenma. It willingly accepted the U.S. request, raising a hue and cry over "security uneasiness" allegedly created this time.
					
					 This made the U.S. raise a shout of joy.
					
					 The May 24th issue of the New York Times in an article described Japan's decision to transfer the U.S. forces' airfield from Futenma to the Camp Schwab coastal area, as requested by the latter, as a U.S. victory.
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak group of traitors has greatly benefited from the case.
					
					 It made public "investigation results" and then the "statement to the people" with the "June 2 elections to local self-governing bodies" just around the corner, maximizing the effect of its conspiratorial farce in the elections. 
					
					 It has launched a wholesale political terror campaign to ensure an unchallenged domination of the Right-wing conservative group by kicking up an unprecedented atmosphere hostile to the DPRK in the south Korean society and purging pro-reunification progressive forces. 
					
					 It has completely frozen exchange and cooperation between the north and the south and brought the inter-Korean relations back to those before the publication of the June 15 joint declaration, pushing the situation on the Korean Peninsula to a war phase in a moment. By doing so the group of traitors pleased its master more than ever before and created conditions favorable for its stay in power.
					
					 As seen above, the fact that American master and his south Korean servants benefited more than any others from the case of "Cheonan" that claimed the lives of 46 soldiers of the puppet army clearly proves that the  "the story about the north's torpedo attack" is nothing but a lie faked up by the U.S. and the south Korean authorities.
					
					 The international community should pay attention to the fact that the "Cheonan" case presages the full-fledged commencement of the U.S. "war on terrorism" for aggression in Northeast Asia as it is the Asian version of "September 11 incident" cooked up by it with the south Korean puppet authorities involved in a bid to turn the politico-military environment in the Asia-Pacific region, strategic hub in the 21st century, decisively favorable to it.

articles.title: Talks between WPK and LPRP Delegations Held
articles.content:
Talks Held between WPK and LPRP Delegations
 Pyongyang, May 26 (KCNA) -- Talks were held here on Wednesday between delegations of the Workers' Party of Korea and the Lao People's Revolutionary Party.
					 Present there from the DPRK side were Department Director Kim Yong Il and other officials of the WPK Central Committee and from the opposite side were members of the LPRP delegation led by Boun Thong Chitmani, member of the Secretariat of the Central Committee and chairman of the Organization Commission of the LPRP, and Chaleune Warinthrasak, Lao ambassador to the DPRK.
					
					 At the talks both sides briefed each other on the activities of their parties and exchanged views on further developing the friendly and cooperative relations between the two parties and issues of common concern.

articles.title: Gift from Lao Party Delegation
articles.content:
Gift from Lao Party Delegation
 Pyongyang, May 26 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a gift by the visiting delegation of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party (LPRP).
					 The gift was handed over to Kim Yong Il, department director of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, by Boun Thong Chitmani, member of the Secretariat of the Central Committee of the LPRP and chairman of its Organization Commission who is heading the delegation, on Wednesday.

articles.title: Okryu Restaurant Becomes More Popular for Terrapin Dishes
articles.content:
Okryu Restaurant Becomes More Popular for Terrapin Dishes
 Pyongyang, May 26 (KCNA) -- The Okryu Restaurant on the bank of the River Taedong in Pyongyang, the Democratic People's Republic of Korea,  is famous for cold noodle.
					 Since it began serving terrapin dishes, including slices of raw terrapin, broth, stew, porridge and juice, some time ago, the restaurant has enjoyed greater popularity.
					
					 Terrapin has long been used in preparing haute cuisine for its good taste and rich nutritive ingredients.
					
					 It, which contains such essential nutrients as protein, essential amino acids and vitamins, is efficacious for hepatitis, hypertension and other diseases.
					
					 Its blood, known as antianemic and tonic, is good for weakness of children
					
					 Ra Suk Gyong, 53-year-old chief chef of the restaurant, told KCNA that sturgeon and quail dishes are also included in its menu.

articles.title: Sonjuk Bridge, Famous Historic Relics
articles.content:
Sonjuk Bridge, Famous Historic Relics
 Pyongyang, May 26 (KCNA) -- The Sonjuk Bridge in Kaesong City, the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, was built in the period of Koryo (918-1392).
					 The stone bridge, originally named Sonji Bridge, is 8.35 meters long and 3.36 meters wide. Though short, it became famous for a historical event.
					
					 On the bridge Jong Mong Ju, a high-ranking official in the late period of Koryo, was killed by followers of Ri Song Gye seeking a new dynasty.
					
					 It has been told that after his death, a bamboo came up on the spot where he was killed, and since then the bridge has been called Sonjuk Bridge (juk means bamboo).
					
					 In around 1780 his descendants, in the hope of preserving the bridge as historic relics, closed it up with stone parapets and built another one near it for traffic.
					
					 The Sonjuk Bridge, believed to be one of the oldest stone bridges remaining in Korea, is well exhibitive of the then architecture and masonry.
					
					 Seen in the place are a stone monument with an inscription "Sonjukgyo" (Sonjuk Bridge) written by Han Sok Bong, a noted Korean calligrapher of the middle ages, and other monuments.

articles.title: S. Korea's Moves for War Aggression on DPRK Flayed
articles.content:
S. Korea's Moves for War Aggression on DPRK Flayed
Pyongyang, May 26 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Wednesday in a signed commentary slashes at the dangerous moves of the south Korean puppet authorities who seek to dare commit military provocations against the DPRK in conspiracy with outside forces, regarding the case of the warship sinking as the best chance to ignite a war of aggression on it.
					 The puppet military has begun implementing what it called "50 day-plan for winning sure victory", while vociferating about "readjusting the conception of operation" in the waters of the West Sea and "rounding off the operational posture." 
					
					 The warmongers are busy making a switchover in the "keynote of the military strategy" to a "deterrent strategic system" capable of "promptly striking" strategic military targets of the DPRK within 24 hours, trumpeting about "free chastisement." 
					
					 The puppet forces are contemplating staging large-scale combined anti-submarine exercises together with the U.S. in the West Sea as a "military retaliatory measure" taken in line with the "results of investigation". A nuclear-powered submarine and aircraft carrier of the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces will reportedly be involved in those maneuvers. 
					
					 No one can predict when these dangerous war exercises will develop into an all-out war, the commentary says, and goes on: 
					
					 If the warmongers of south Korea foolishly preempt a war against the DPRK in collusion with outside forces, they are bound to perish in the flames kindled by themselves. 
					
					 They would be well advised to stop going reckless, well aware of the will of the army and the people of the DPRK to wipe them out.

articles.title: Prevailing Situation Requires Merciless Counter-Actions
articles.content:
Prevailing Situation Requires Merciless Counter-Actions
 Pyongyang, May 26 (KCNA) -- After cooking up the conspiratorial case of the warship sinking the puppet group of south Korea is crying out for what it called "punishment" and "retaliation" and urging the international community to slap additional "sanctions" against the DPRK, pushing the situation on the Korean Peninsula to an extremely dangerous phase. The prevailing situation calls for taking merciless counter-actions of justice. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday says this in a signed commentary.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The conservative authorities of south Korea are staging a conspiratorial farce to harm and stifle the DPRK in collusion with the United States and Japan, their masters, and contemplating daring make a preemptive strike at the DPRK. The principled stand clarified in the statement issued by a spokesman for the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and the statement released by a spokesman of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea is an entirely just self-defensive measure to cope with the prevailing situation. 
					
					 Such unprecedentedly conspiratorial case as the sinking of the warship faked up by the puppet forces goes to prove that they will never give up their scenario for confrontation with fellow countrymen and hysteria of a war of aggression on the DPRK before meeting deaths and, accordingly, Koreans can hardly expect the security of the country and the nation or national reunification and they can never escape the fate of falling victim to a nuclear war to be provoked by foreign forces as long as those quislings are allowed to stay.
					
					 Unshakable is the revolutionary will of the army and people of the DPRK to mete out a thousand-fold punishment to the puppet war-thirsty forces, who are making desperate efforts to start a war against the DPRK at any cost after bringing the inter-Korean relations to a total collapse in league with outsiders, and react to their "retaliation" with stronger retaliation and "chastisement" with indiscriminate punishment of Korean style. 
					
					 The puppet group should face up to the prevailing situation and make an apology to the nation for having staged the reckless anti-DPRK farce and appear in the court to face a stern judgment of history and the nation. 
					
					 If the group finally ignites a war against the DPRK, persistently crying out for "punishment", "retaliation" and "sanctions", it will face our unimaginable, unlimited and devastating retaliatory blows to meet its end.

articles.title: Japan's Moral Vulgarity Slammed
articles.content:
Japan's Moral Vulgarity Slammed
 Pyongyang, May 26 (KCNA) -- Some days ago, remains of several Koreans were discovered in an airfield construction site of the former Imperial Japanese Army in Hokkaido of Japan. They are just part of the so many Koreans who were beaten and stabbed to death and buried alive by the Japanese imperialists. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday observes this in a signed commentary.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The whereabouts of many of those who were taken to Japan still remain unknown. This is attributable to the attitude and stand of the Japanese government. 
					
					 Japan must know better than any others where the remains of Koreans were buried and how many they were. However, Japan is turning away from this issue, feigning ignorance of it. 
					
					 The Japanese government does not feel the pricks of conscience as regards the aggression perpetrated by the Japanese imperialists in the past but runs the whole gamut of cynical ploys to evade the responsibility for it.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries are going so arrogant as to claim that Japan has no obligation to make any apology and reparation to Korea. Lurking behind this attitude of Japan is a sinister intention to justify and repeat its crimes committed in the past.
					
					 If the hostile relations between the DPRK and Japan reach the extremity, they can hardly escape an explosion. In pursuit of this aim the Japanese reactionaries are staging an unprecedented anti-DPRK campaign, driving the situation into an extreme phase. This campaign, however, will get Japan nowhere as its reckless moves will only bring disaster to itself. 
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries would be well advised to honor their commitment, well aware that the settlement of their past crimes is beneficial for Japan's security and peaceful life.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on Benevolent Politics of WPK
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on Benevolent Politics of WPK
 Pyongyang, May 26 (KCNA) -- The benevolent politics pursued by the Workers' Party of Korea is the great political mode ensuring the advantages and invincibility of Korean-style socialism centred on the popular masses and the foundation for guaranteeing the victory of socialism that the Korean people should always hold fast to, Rodong Sinmun Wednesday says in a signed article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 The benevolent politics of the WPK, an embodiment of President Kim Il Sung's idea of believing in people as in Heaven, serves as the main source of the great single-minded unity, the powerful motive force of training the army and people of the DPRK to be persons strong in idea and faith and the driving force helping give the fullest play to the inexhaustible creative ingenuity of the army and people in their drive to build a great prosperous and powerful nation.
					
					Our single-minded unity represents the most stable harmonious whole in which the headquarters of the revolution and the army and people share the same idea and destiny and the society in the DPRK is a big socialist family in which all the people lead a genuine life, holding General Secretary Kim Jong Il in high esteem as their father.
					
					 If there be any almighty being in the world, it is the popular masses, and the Korean people with tremendous creative talents and enthusiasm can not but be called "great". This is the noble outlook of Kim Jong Il on the people.
					
					 There are a lot of countries in the world and all of them have their state leaders. But, the world knows no such great statesman as Kim Jong Il who arouses the revolutionary enthusiasm and creative activity of the servicepersons and people, always finding himself among them.
					
					 Our servicepersons created new Chollima Speed, "Huichon Speed" in the Songun era and the workers of the Songjin Steel Complex, the Kim Chaek Iron and Steel Complex and the February 8 Vinalon Complex performed the miracles of mass-producing Juche-based iron and fiber in the 21st century, thus bringing about great auspicious events to the whole country. They are a shining fruition of Kim Jong Il's politics based on love and trust.

articles.title: S. Korea Plans to Stage Provocative Military Exercises
articles.content:
S. Korea Plans to Stage Provocative Military Exercises
 Pyongyang, May 26 (KCNA) -- The puppet warmongers of south Korea are mulling a series of provocative war exercises in the waters of the West Sea of Korea, according to south Korean Yonhap News and KBS.
					 The second fleet of the puppet navy announced that it would stage an anti-submarine maneuver in the waters off the coast of South Chungchong Province on May 27. 
					
					 The warmongers declared that they would conduct a drill of sinking a mock submarine through naval bombardment and anti-submarine bomb, etc. under the simulated conditions of an actual battle with ten different type warships and anti-submarine patrol planes including destroyers and patrol ships involved. 
					
					 They also worked out a plan to stage the largest-ever anti-submarine joint military maneuvers in the waters off Phyongthaek in June in a coordinated operation with U.S. naval forces of the scope of nuclear carrier flotilla.
					
					 They are kicking off war hysteria, openly advertising the projected naval maneuvers as a "demonstration of forces to cope with additional provocations of the north". 
					
					 They were also reported to have examined a plan to stage with U.S. forces field mobile exercises as large as the Team Spirit joint military exercises. 
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak group of traitors heated by hysteria of a reckless war of aggression on the DPRK is stirring up the atmosphere of confrontation with it to an extreme phase and getting frantic with military provocations with the sinking of warship "Cheonan" as a momentum, driving the situation to the brink of explosion.

articles.title: "Results of Investigation" Snubbed in S. Korea
articles.content:
"Results of Investigation" Snubbed in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, May 26 (KCNA) -- Religious organizations in south Korea including the Pastors' Council for Realizing Justice and Peace, the Catholic Priests' Council for Justice, the Association of Buddhist Priests for Realizing Buddhism and the Zen Buddhists Group for Social Changes called a press conference on May 24 to refute the "results of investigation" into the case of the sinking of warship "Cheonan" released by the puppet authorities, according to south Korean KBS. 
					 The organizations asserted that the "joint investigation team" to probe the case was wrongly composed and the period of "investigation" was also wrongly fixed.
					
					 They demanded that a new investigation team be formed to properly probe the case, saying that the above-said "results of investigation" can never clear people's doubts about the case.

articles.title: Despicable Plot of GNP under Fire in S. Korea
articles.content:
Despicable Plot of GNP under Fire in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, May 26 (KCNA) -- A lawmaker from the Democratic Party of south Korea called an emergency press conference at the "National Assembly" on May 24 to assail the group of the "Grand National Party" for working hard to use the sinking of the warship for its political purpose, according to south Korean CBS.
					 He opened to media a GNP's document for internal circulation, which had been worked out to cope with "elections to the local self-governing bodies."
					
					 Explaining that the document defines the sinking of the warship as a "security issue" and calls for its wide publicity to the people, he held that this was material evidence proving the ruling camp's plot to misuse the above-said case for its election purpose.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Lauded by Iranian First Vice-President
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Lauded by Iranian First Vice-President
 Pyongyang, May 26 (KCNA) -- Mohammad-Reza Rahimi, first vice-president of the Islamic Republic of Iran, met and had a talk with the delegation of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League headed by Ri Yong Chol, first secretary of its Central Committee, on May 24.
					 He said that President Kim Il Sung was a universally recognized great man deeply revered by the world people for his undying feats performed in carrying out the cause of independence against imperialism.
					
					 The Iranian government rejoices as over its own over the successes made by the Korean people in their struggle against the U.S. and imperialism and in the efforts to build a great prosperous and powerful socialist nation under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il, he added. 
					
					 He wished the Korean people and youth greater success in the future.

articles.title: Withdrawal of US Imperialists from S. Korea Demanded
articles.content:
Withdrawal of US Imperialists from S. Korea Demanded
 Pyongyang, May 26 (KCNA) -- The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea issued a joint statement on May 17 on the occasion of the 30th anniversary of the Kwangju Popular Uprising.
					 Youth and students and citizens rose in a popular armed uprising against the colonial fascist rule enforced by the U.S. imperialists and their stooges in Kwangju of south Korea in May 1980, and the Chun Doo Hwan military fascist clique brutally massacred participants in the uprising and innocent citizens under the backstage wire-pulling of the U.S., the statement noted, and went on:
					
					 The massacre perpetrated in Kwangju at the U.S. instigation was a crime against humanity from A to Z.
					
					 The uprising was a popular armed uprising in which south Korean people rose to reject the U.S. neo-colonialist domination and realize the independent and peaceful reunification of the country and social democracy. 
					
					 The bloody Kwangju popular uprising was put down but it will always be remembered as an event that triggered off the struggle of the south Korean people against the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet clique.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists, the chief culprit and manipulator of the Kwangju massacre, should quit south Korea at once, the statement urged.

articles.title: NDC Spokesman's Statement Supported
articles.content:
NDC Spokesman's Statement Supported
 Pyongyang, May 26 (KCNA) -- Personages of Finland and France released statements on May 20 in support of the statement issued by a spokesman for the National Defence Commission of the DPRK.
					 The director of the "Kominform" Company of Finland said in a statement that the DPRK can never take military action against its fellow countrymen in the light of its political idea, adding that the case of the sinking of south Korea's warship "Cheonan" is evidently a charade orchestrated by the south Korean authorities.
					
					 Noting that the DPRK is a righteous country and military plots against this country can never go down with anyone, he added that the DPRK's innocence as regards the case will be brought to light just as justice is always bound to win a victory.
					
					 Lyne Sinyodyium, a member of the French Group for the Study of the Juche Idea, in a statement expressed full support for the statement of the DPRK NDC spokesman which declared the firm attitude and principled stand of the DPRK government on the sinister plot hatched by the south Korean authorities.
					
					 He said that the army and the people of the DPRK united close around their leader will remain unfazed despite whole gamut of vituperation and mud-slinging at it. The DPRK demonstrating its might by dint of Songun is prepared for both sanctions and war, he stressed.

articles.title: Anniversary of Start of Work at WPK Marked
articles.content:
Anniversary of Start of Work at WPK Marked
Pyongyang, May 26 (KCNA) -- A meeting took place in Mexico, a lecture in Guinea and a film show in Russia between May 17 and 20 on the occasion of the 46th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Speeches were made at the functions.
					
					 The chief of a district in Mexico City of Mexico hoped that the Korean people would achieve great success in their efforts to build a great prosperous and powerful nation and reunify the country under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il this year marking the 65th birthday of the WPK.
					
					 Banou Keita, chairman of the Guinea-Korea Friendship Association, said that the Korean people boundlessly trust and follow Kim Jong Il who has worked day and night for the people and happy future without taking care of himself.
					
					 After watching the Korean film "Party Founding Memorial Tower," the general director of a company of Russia said that he came to know well about the origin of the WPK and its brilliant history.

articles.title: Jefe de delegacion militar vuelve a advertir a la parte Sur
articles.content:
Jefe de delegacion militar vuelve a advertir a la parte Sur
						
Pyongyang, 26 de mayo (ATCC) -- Como ya trascendidos, los gangsteres del circulo militar surcoreano esculpen las consignas de guerra psicologica anti-Republica Popular Democratica de Corea en los puestos de gendarmeria en la zona desmilitarizada de la Linea de Demarcacion Militar y se mueven intensamente para reiniciar la radiodifusion psicologica contra aquella con altavoces.
					  En relacion con tales imprudentes movimientos de los belicistas del ejercito titere surcoreano, el jefe de la delegacion de la parte Norte a las conversaciones militares a nivel de general Norte-Sur envio el dia 26 el siguiente aviso:
					
					  En los ultimos dias, pese a las reiteradas advertencias nuestras, la parte surcoreana maniobra imprudentemente para reanudar en el frente la radiodifusion psicologica contra la RPDC como si no le bastara el lanzamiento de volantes de contenido anti-RPDC.
					
					  Este acto constituye la provocacion premeditada para llevar al borde de guerra las actuales relaciones Norte-Sur en via de empeoramiento.
					
					  Si prosigue el esparcimiento de volantes de la parte surcoreana y se reinicia hasta la radiodifusion psicologica, se tomaran enseguida las contramedidas intransigentes de nuestro ejercito, incluyendo la accion fisica.
					
					  En particular, si la parte surcoreana instala hasta los altavoces en el contorno del frente para reiniciar esa emision radial, esto significara la quiebra abierta del acuerdo militar Norte-Sur y la provocacion militar contra la RPDC. Por lo tanto, nuestra parte tomara la medida militar para eliminar con el fuego a punteria directa todos los altavoces en cuanto sean instalados.
					
					  Y a la larga se tomara la medida de bloquear totalmente el acceso del personal y vehiculos surcoreanos a la zona de administracion conjunta Norte-Sur en la costa del Mar Oeste.
					
					  Los belicistas titeres surcoreanos deben actuar con prudencia teniendo presente que no seran palabras hueras las medidas referidas de nuestro ejercito.

articles.title: Quienes se benefician mas del caso de "Cheonan", comenta ATCC
articles.content:
Quienes se benefician mas del caso de "Cheonan", comenta ATCC
Pyongyang, 26 de mayo (ATCC) -- Despues de publicado el "resultado de investigacion" del hundimiento del buque de guerra "Cheonan", manipulado por las autoridades titeres surcoreanas, Estados Unidos toma la delantera en armar escandalos en el mundo.
					  Analizar primero quien saca mayor provecho de un caso criminal deviene el principio basico de la criminologia.
					
					  EE.UU. y sus "aliados" de Asia-Pacifico son los que se benefician del incidente del buque "Cheonan" de la marina de guerra surcoreana que fue sumergido en el Mar Oeste de Corea dividiendose en dos partes.  En particular, EE.UU. encabeza la lista de los beneficiarios.
					
					  Como esta conocido por todo el mundo, la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea concentra toda su fuerza a la ofensiva general para abrir las puertas a la gran potencia prospera hasta el ano 2012.
					
					  Si se toma en cuenta por referencia que la paz es la premisa de desarrollo, ella necesita ahora mas que nunca un ambiente exterior pacifico. Por eso presento la propuesta de establecer el sistema de paz duradera en la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					  Sin embargo, EE.UU. realiza una campana de propaganda en el sentido de que la RPDC estuviera sacando del incidente ciertos "provechos" politicos como la "unidad interna".
					
					  Esta opinion absurda se atribuye a la confusion entre la realidad y la ambicion subjetiva, cometida por el imperio por su ansia de ver derrocado el regimen de la RPDC, o al demasiado salto de la logica de quienes tratan de calumniarla haciendo vista gorda de la realidad de Corea enfrascada en la construccion de una potencia economica.
					
					  Los hombres juiciosos comprenderan facilmente que la RPDC no tiene nada que ganar creando un incidente como el mencionado.
					
					  Pero, sucede lo contrario en el caso de EE.UU.
					
					  Este imperio esta sonriendo satisfecho por el estallido del incidente.
					
					  El lo considera como mejor oportunidad para tomar en su mano los "aliados" de la region de Asia y el Pacifico, mantener a raya a otras potencias y ampliar la ofensiva para aplastar a la RPDC mediante la propaganda de la "teoria de amenaza proveniente del Norte de Corea".
					
					  Realmente, la administracion Obama emitio a sus tropas ocupantes del Sur de Corea la orden de estar en la disposicion de combate frente a la eventual guerra coreana e hizo otras cosas para agravar la situacion aumentando las fuerzas armadas y fortaleciendo la dominacion militar sobre la region. 
					
					  Bajo el control de EE.UU., los titeres surcoreanos y las autoridades japonesas expresaron abiertamente su resentimiento del desarrollo de las relaciones Corea-China y se mueven mas activamente que nunca para aplastar a la RPDC demandando a los paises vecinos de esta que reconozca ese absurdisimo "resultado de investigacion".
					
					  El gobierno japones, que doblegado ante la presion de EE.UU. en el problema de mudanza del aeropuerto de las tropas norteamericanas en Futenma, acechaba la oportunidad de enganar a los moradores del departamento de Okinawa, acepto sin vacilacion esta vez la demanda de EE.UU. hablando ruidosamente de la "inseguridad".
					
					  Este exito inesperado basto para que el imperio pusiera sus gritos de alegria en el cielo.
					
					  El periodico norteamericano "New York Times" publico el dia 24 un articulo calificando de victoria de EE.UU. el hecho de que Japon definio la area litoral Camp Schwab como destino de mudanza del citado aeropuerto accediendo a la demanda del primero.
					
					  La banda traidora de Lee Myung Bak tambien gana mucho en el caso del "Cheonan".
					
					  A fin de poner al maximo en las inminentes "elecciones locales del 2 de junio" el efecto de ese drama inventado por si misma, esa banda publico uno tras otro el "resultado de investigacion" y la "declaracion al pueblo" en visperas de esos comicios.
					
					  Tambien, creo en la sociedad surcoreana el ambiente hostil a la RPDC sin precedente en la historia e inicio la gran campana de terror politico con la meta de lograr el dominio absoluto del campo de conservadores derechistas eliminando a las fuerzas progresistas partidarias de reunificacion.
					
					  Quebro totalmente el intercambio y la colaboracion entre el Norte y el Sur, volvio las relaciones bilaterales a la epoca antes de la publicacion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y llevo en un instante la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana a la coyuntura de guerra.
					
					  De esta manera, se congracio mas con su amo y procuro las condiciones favorables al mantenimiento de su poder.
					
					  En definitiva, el amo y el titere estan sacando mayor provecho del sacrificio de 46 soldados surcoreanos. Esto comprueba que la "teoria de ataque torpedero del Norte" contra el buque "Cheonan" es la farsa orquestada por EE.UU. y el Sur de Corea.
					
					  La sociedad internacional debe prestar atencion a que el caso del "Cheonan" es el prefacio del inicio crucial de la agresiva "guerra antiterrorista" de EE.UU. en el Nordeste Asiatico, siendo la version asiatica del "incidente de 11 de septiembre", inventada por el imperio por intermedio de las autoridades surcoreanas con el proposito de cambiar a su conveniencia la atmosfera politico-militar de Asia-Pacifico, foco estrategico del siglo 21.

articles.title: Conversan en Pyongyang las delegaciones del PTC y del PPRL
articles.content:
Conversan en Pyongyang las delegaciones del PTC y del PPRL
Pyongyang, 26 de mayo (ATCC) -- Tuvieron lugar el dia 26 en esta capital las conversaciones entre la delegacion del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y la del Partido Popular Revolucionario Lao.
					  Estuvieron presentes por la parte coreana el jefe de departamento Kim Yong Il y otros funcionarios del CC del PTC, y por la contraparte, los miembros de la delegacion del PPRL encabezada por Boun Thong Chitmani, miembro del secretariado del Comite Central y presidente de la comision de organizacion de esta agrupacion, y el embajador lao en Corea, Chaleune Warinthrasak.
					
					  En la ocasion ambas partes se informaron de las actividades de respectivos partidos e intercambiaron las opiniones sobre el mayor desarrollo de las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre los dos partidos y otros problemas de interes mutuo.
